divs: sighting detailshey guy's. i will say, this is my first encounter. i was standing at my kitchen sink fixing mom's breakfast when i looked up and something in the sky caught my eye. i looked and said "what is that" and then said "no way" so i went out the back door to spot it to see if there was any sound...no sound, so i went back in, grabbed my binoculars, went back out and got a good look at my first ufo. isn't it funny how when something like this happens your camera isn't right beside you. i watched it for approximately 1 1\2 to 2 minutes, gliding saliently across the sky just below the clouds. it started getting behind my roof so i repositioned myself to watch it more. i was too shaky to see it so i repositioned myself again against my gas grill, but it disappeared. that's my story. would you please let me know if anyone else reports something near my location. thanks a bunch. ( "an avid sky watcher") it was approximately 2 inch's long in the binoculars (reference) it was what i would call oblong oval shaped. almost cigar like. it was very shiney and silver in color. traveling south west.
Summary: Thin Oval, Shiney, Silvery, Satin Finish
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Blue Ridge
There were no other sightings in Blue Ridge on or around September 27th 2009
